Item.sqlserver_body: /* Name: select_pm_projectcolormap_id Created: 1-DEC-2005 George J. Carrette */ CREATE FUNCTION innovator.Select_pm_projectcolormap_id(@STATE VARCHAR(64)) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN SELECT value = (SELECT ID FROM [PM_PROJECTCOLORMAP] WHERE SOURCE_ID = (SELECT ID FROM [PREFERENCE] WHERE IDENTITY_ID = (SELECT id FROM [identity] WHERE name = 'World')) AND ACTIVITY_STATE = @STATE)
Item.name: select_pm_projectcolormap_id
